caption.p: ROS production in LPS-stimulated astrocytes. Astrocytes were induced with LPS (1 μg/mL) and then incubated for 24 h with 100 μg/mL of Rhaponticum carthamoides HR and SGR essential oils. Values are given as means ± SD of three independent experiments. ∗ p < 0.05 versus control; # p < 0.05 HR essential oil versus SGR essential oil.
